MeasurementToolMetadata.Description:
The Short Dark Triad

Reference:
Used (before publication): Paulhus, D. L. (2013) . Dark triad of personality (D3-Short). Measurement instrument database for the social science.
Original: Jones, D.N., Paulhus, D.L. (2014) Introducing the short Dark Triad (SD3): a brief measure of dark personality traits. Assessment, 21(1):28-41. doi: 10.1177/1073191113514105

Assessing Narcissism, Psychopathy, and Machiavellianism in a sub-clinical form.
